meanings.definition: A shot in a film or television program that interrupts the main action to show a different scene.
meanings.sent1: During the movie, there was a cutaway to a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent2: The director used a cutaway to reveal the hidden treasure chest.
meanings.sent3: In the film, the cutaway to the dancing penguin brought unexpected laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a cutaway to a serene meadow, away from the chaos.
meanings.sent5: The cutaway to the starry night sky left a lasting impression on the audience.

meanings.definition: A type of jacket with a front that is cut away below the waist.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish cutaway jacket to the party.
meanings.sent2: The cutaway jacket added a modern touch to his outfit.
meanings.sent3: The cutaway jacket made him look like a fashionable detective.
meanings.sent4: Her cutaway jacket was like a window to her trendy taste in fashion.
meanings.sent5: The cutaway jacket fluttered in the wind as she walked down the street.

meanings.definition: A small section of a building or vehicle that has been cut away to show the interior.
meanings.sent1: The model car had a cutaway to display the engine inside.
meanings.sent2: The museum exhibit featured a cutaway of the ancient castle.
meanings.sent3: The cutaway of the house revealed a miniature family having a tea party.
meanings.sent4: The cutaway of the spaceship showed the intricate technology within.
meanings.sent5: The cutaway of the tree trunk exposed the hidden world of insects and worms.
